definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: There were no significant differences between boys and girls in their attitudes toward learning English with picture-book instruction.
sentences.chinese: 不同性別學童對英語繪本教學之學習態度無顯著差異。

sentences.english: Are you searching for the album of your childhood, too?
sentences.chinese: 而各位是否也在尋找童年時的繪本呢？

sentences.english: In the lazy summer afternoon, drinking a glass of plum juice, turning a few pages of picture books.
sentences.chinese: 在慵懶的夏日午後，喝一杯酸梅汁，翻幾頁繪本。

sentences.english: This is an illustrated audio book for children.
sentences.chinese: 這是一本圖文並茂的童話繪本有聲書。

sentences.english: This paper mainly discusses the production characteristics of picture books and illustration.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要是對繪本圖書及其插圖的創作特徵進行探討。
幾米老師2010年的全新長篇繪本作品。

sentences.english: This is a well-loved picture book that has truly withstood the test of time.
sentences.chinese: 這是一本接受了時間的考驗而且受到廣泛喜愛的繪本。

sentences.english: The third chapter is discussion Ko-hsiang Liu 's animal fiction and iconographic of natural literature.
sentences.chinese: 第參章探討劉克襄的動物小說及自然文學繪本。

definition: to enlighten/to explain (a text etc)/to stimulate (a mental attitude)/enlightenment/revelation/motivation
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
